DataElement.preferredName: Dental Professional Practice Temporomandibular Joint Disorder Pain Diagnostic Procedure Specified Question Assessment Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A yes/no indicator related to diagnostic assessment by specific questions in dental professional practice for pain from condition affecting the anatomic and functional characteristics of the temporomandibular joint.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Dental Professional Practice Temporomandibular Joint Disorder Pain Diagnostic Procedure Specified Question Assessment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to diagnostic assessment by specific questions in dental professional practice for pain from condition affecting the anatomic and functional characteristics of the temporomandibular joint.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Dental Professional Practice Temporomandibular Joint Disorder Pain Diagnostic Procedure
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to a tooth or teeth, or to odontology.:Health care professional business directed towards treatment and care of patients.:Any condition affecting the anatomic and functional characteristics of the temporomandibular joint.:An unpleasant sensation induced by noxious stimuli and generally received by specialized nerve endings.:Methods, procedures, and tests performed to diagnose disease, disordered function, or disability.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to a tooth or teeth, or to odontology.
Health care professional business directed towards treatment and care of patients.
A disorder that affects the masticatory muscles and temporomandibular joint.
The sensation of discomfort, distress, or agony, resulting from the stimulation of specialized nerve endings.
Any procedure or test to diagnose a disease or disorder.

Property.preferredDefinition: Specified; clearly and explicitly stated.:A sentence of inquiry that asks for a reply; a request for information (e.g., a formal request to a database or search engine).:Having determined the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: A sentence of inquiry that asks for a reply; a request for information (e.g., a formal request to a database or search engine).
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: PEARL CRF:Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

ReferenceDocuments.name: In a study of TMJD pain in yo
ReferenceDocuments.description: In a study of TMJD pain in your practice, would you be willing to use only the following two questions to identify patients with TMJD pain
